definitions.definition: To play aimlessly.
definitions.example: You're fiddling your life away.

definitions.definition: To adjust or manipulate for deception or fraud.
definitions.example: Fred was sacked when the auditors caught him fiddling the books.

definitions.definition: To play traditional tunes on a violin in a non-classical style.
To touch or fidget with something in a restless or nervous way, or tinker with something in an attempt to make minor adjustments or improvements.
Action of the verb to fiddle
Of petty or trivial importance; footling
definitions.example: It was a fiddling little fault, but ultimately proved disastrous.

definitions.definition: Travelling without companions
Performed or scored without accompaniment; solo
A high-level class that passes attributes and methods down the hierarchy to subclasses.
A taxon ranking below a phylum and above a class.
To create a superclass of.
The repurchase of something previously sold, especially of stock by the company that issued it.
A government purchase scheme intended to achieve a specific goal such as habitat protection or a reduction in firearm numbers.
A free drink given to a patron by a bartender.
(of fish) To form into, or travel in a school.
To educate, teach, or train (often, but not necessarily, in a school).
definitions.example: Many future prime ministers were schooled in Eton.

definitions.definition: To defeat emphatically, to teach an opponent a harsh lesson.
To control, or compose, one's expression.
definitions.example: She took care to school her expression, not giving away any of her feelings.

definitions.definition: A man who has a sexual relationship with a woman from whom he receives payment.
A hired escort or dancing partner for a woman.
A person who practices forestry.
A person who lives in a forest.
A moth in the family Zygaenidae.
Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Lethe. Other members of this genus are called tree browns and wood browns.
The state of being absent, especially frequently or without good reason; the practice of an absentee.
The practice of absenting oneself from the country or district where one's estate is situated.
A witch, sorceress, or enchantress; a wizard.
An ugly old woman.
A fury; a she-monster.
A hagfish; one of various eel-like fish of the family Myxinidae, allied to the lamprey, with a suctorial mouth, labial appendages, and a single pair of gill openings.
A hagdon or shearwater; one of various sea birds of the genus Puffinus.
An appearance of light and fire on a horse's mane or a man's hair.
The fruit of the hagberry, Prunus padus.
Sleep paralysis
A small wood, or part of a wood or copse, which is marked off or enclosed for felling, or which has been felled.
A quagmire; mossy ground where peat or turf has been cut.
To harass; to weary with vexation.
Something that can be quantified; a measurable.
Capable of being quantified.
Any of three semistable mesons, having positive, negative or neutral charge, composed of up and down quarks/antiquarks.
A long piece cut or rent off; a sharp, slender fragment; a splinter.
A strand, or slender roll, of cotton or other fiber in a loose, untwisted state, produced by a carding machine and ready for the roving or slubbing which precedes spinning.
Bait made of pieces of small fish. Compare kibblings.
A narrow high-rise apartment building.
To cut or divide into long, thin pieces, or into very small pieces; to cut or rend lengthwise; to slit.

definitions.definition: A protein hormone produced in adipose tissue; it plays a role in regulating appetite and metabolism.
A forager, especially in Sherman's March to the Sea of November to December 1864.
An idle, worthless fellow, without any visible means of support; a dissipated sponger.
A lamb (typically the smallest of a multiple birth) which has been abandoned by its mother or orphaned, and as a consequence is raised in part or in whole by humans.
A disappointment, a pity, a shame.
definitions.example: That's a total bummer.

definitions.definition: Homosexual male
Of poor quality or highly undesirable.

definitions.definition: Unfair.
definitions.example: bum deal

definitions.definition: Injured and without the possibility of full repair, defective.
definitions.example: I can't play football anymore on account of my bum knee.

definitions.definition: Unpleasant or unhappy.
definitions.example: He had a bum trip on that mescaline.

definitions.definition: Exclamation of annoyance or frustration at a bummer (disappointment).
A line connecting isometric points.
Of, or exhibiting equality in dimensions.
Of, or being a geometric system of three equal axes lying at right angles to each other (especially in crystallography).
Of or involving muscular contraction against resistance in which the length of the muscle remains the same. See also: Wikipedia:isometric exercise
(of a thermodynamic process) Taking place at constant volume because of being confined by rigid boundaries.
An act or instance of retracting.
A statement printed or broadcast in a public forum which effects the withdrawal of an earlier assertion, and which concedes that the earlier assertion was in error.
A continuous function from a topological space onto a subspace which is the identity on that subspace.
To ask or beset a debtor for payment.
To harass by continually repeating e.g. a request.
To cure, as codfish, by laying them, after salting, in a pile in a dark place, covered with saltgrass or a similar substance.
Attempt to collect a debt.

definitions.definition: A grouch or killjoy.
A person who aggressively sets out to ruin the Christmas holidays for others.
Without love.
definitions.example: Theirs was a loveless marriage: they stayed together even though they didn't care for each other.

definitions.definition: (sometimes figurative) To make sharp.
definitions.example: to sharpen a pencil or a knife or a musical note

definitions.definition: To become sharp.
Having a sharp point or edge.

definitions.definition: Either of the two orifices located on the nose (or on the beak of a bird); used as a passage for air and other gases to travel the nasal passages.

A synthetic version of this hormone used to treat Addison's disease and other conditions.

To purchase land so that the remaining adjacent sections are smaller than the minimum area purchasable as freehold, thus excluding potential freeholders.
That which is innermost; the core.
Farthest inside or towards the center or middle.

Past years; time gone by; yore.
Last year.

Having the same foci
Something given to the poor as charity, such as money, clothing or food.

definitions.definition: To hurt, usually by introducing poison or a sharp point, or both.

definitions.definition: (of an insect) To bite.
(sometimes figurative) To hurt, to be in pain.

definitions.definition: To cause harm or pain to.
definitions.example: I thought I could park in front of the hotel, but they stung me for five pounds!

definitions.definition: A ghost or apparition.

A pressure cooker

Collective; assembled; compact.
Of or pertaining to meditation.

definitions.definition: Thoughtful; pensive.

The horse-chestnut.

definitions.definition: The action of exposing something to something, such as skin to the sunlight.

definitions.definition: The act of expulsion, or being expelled, from a place.

To bring forth.

Brought into being by one's begetter(s).

definitions.definition: (collective) All human males collectively: mankind.
A human, a person of either gender, usually an adult. (See usage notes.)

definitions.definition: (collective) All humans collectively: mankind, humankind, humanity. (Sometimes capitalized as Man.)
A member of the genus Homo, especially of the species Homo sapiens.

Manliness; the quality or state of being manly.
A husband.
A lover; a boyfriend.
A male enthusiast or devotee; a male who is very fond of or devoted to a specified kind of thing. (Used as the last element of a compound.)

definitions.definition: A person, usually male, who has duties or skills associated with a specified thing. (Used as the last element of a compound.)
definitions.example: I wanted to be a guitar man on a road tour, but instead I’m a flag man on a road crew.

definitions.definition: A person, usually male, who can fulfill one's requirements with regard to a specified matter.
A male who belongs to a particular group: an employee, a student or alumnus, a representative, etc.
An adult male servant.
A vassal; a subject.

definitions.definition: A piece or token used in board games such as chess.
Used to refer to oneself or one's group: I, we; construed in the third person.
A term of familiar address often implying on the part of the speaker some degree of authority, impatience, or haste.

definitions.definition: A friendly term of address usually reserved for other adult males.

definitions.definition: A player on whom another is playing, with the intent of limiting their attacking impact.

The act or process of intensifying, or of making more intense.
To stop, confuse, or puzzle.

definitions.definition: To travel over (a state, a district, etc.) giving speeches for electioneering purposes.

To remove obstructions, impediments or other unwanted items from.

definitions.definition: To remove (items or material) so as to leave something unobstructed or open.

definitions.definition: To become free from obstruction or obscurement; to become transparent.

definitions.definition: To eliminate ambiguity or doubt from (a matter); to clarify or resolve; to clear up.

definitions.definition: To remove from suspicion, especially of having committed a crime.

definitions.definition: To pass without interference; to miss.

definitions.definition: (activities such as jumping or throwing) To exceed a stated mark.

definitions.definition: To finish or complete (a stage, challenge, or game).
definitions.example: I cleared the first level in 36 seconds.

definitions.definition: Of a check or financial transaction, to go through as payment; to be processed so that the money is transferred.

definitions.definition: To earn a profit of; to net.

definitions.definition: To approve or authorise for a particular purpose or action; to give clearance to.

definitions.definition: To obtain approval or authorisation in respect of.

definitions.definition: To obtain a clearance.

definitions.definition: To obtain permission to use (a sample of copyrighted audio) in another track.

definitions.definition: To reset or unset; to return to an empty state or to zero.

definitions.definition: Free of obstacles.

definitions.definition: Without diminution; in full; net.

To touch repeatedly or stroke delicately in a manner which causes laughter, pleasure and twitching.
definitions.example: He tickled Nancy's tummy, and she started to giggle.

definitions.definition: To unexpectedly touch or stroke delicately in a manner which causes displeasure or withdrawal.
definitions.example: A stranger tickled Nancy's tummy, causing her to scream in fear.

definitions.definition: (of a body part) To feel as if the body part in question is being tickled.
definitions.example: My nose tickles, and I'm going to sneeze!

definitions.definition: To appeal to someone's taste, curiosity etc.
To cause delight or amusement in.
definitions.example: He was tickled to receive such a wonderful gift.

definitions.definition: To feel titillation.
To catch fish in the hand (usually in rivers or smaller streams) by manually stimulating the fins.
To be excited or heartened.
Something which hinders: something that holds back or causes problems with something else.
definitions.example: High-heeled shoes may be fashionable, but they can also be a hindrance to walking.

definitions.definition: The state or act of hindering something
definitions.example: Your hindrance of this process will not be tolerated.

definitions.definition: Acting in a discreet manner; acting in a way that respects privacy or secrecy; quietly
Inconspicuously.
Any of various small American birds in the family Trochilidae that have the ability to hover.
To show mercy.
To keep.
To give up To deprive oneself of, as by being frugal; to do without; to dispense with; to give up; to part with.
The act by which something or someone is spared.
Prudent and restrained in the use of resources; careful, economical or frugal.
A young female cow, (particularly) one over one year old but which has not calved.
A wife.
A girl.
A cow: a large, unattractive, unpleasant woman.
Any of various green gemstones, especially a green transparent form of beryl, highly valued as a precious stone.
Emerald green, a colour.
Any hummingbird in the genera Chlorostilbon and Elvira; and some in the genus Amazilia
A size of type between nonpareil and minion, standardized as 6½-point.
The act or instance of wandering.
definitions.example: to go for a wander in the park

definitions.definition: The situation where a value or signal etc. deviates from the correct or normal value.
definitions.example: baseline wander in ECG signals

definitions.definition: To move without purpose or specified destination; often in search of livelihood.
definitions.example: to wander over the fields

definitions.definition: To stray; stray from one's course; err.
definitions.example: A writer wanders from his subject.

definitions.definition: To commit adultery.
To go somewhere indirectly or at varying speeds; to move in a curved path.
Of the mind, to lose focus or clarity of argument or attention.
To free or deprive of illusion; to disenchant.
Disappointed; experiencing disillusionment; having lost one's illusions.
The state of being preoccupied or an idea that preoccupies the mind; enthrallment.
The act of occupying something before someone else.
The study of, or the branch of medicine specializing in, the medical problems of women, especially disorders of the reproductive organs.
An upholstered sofa, without arms or a back, sometimes with a compartment for storing linen, etc.
A low stool or thick cushion used to rest the feet or as a seat.
A fabric with a pronounced ribbed or corded effect, often made of silk or a mixture of cotton and silk-like yarns.
